product_name: Von Zipper Snark Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Made in Italy, the VonZipper Snark polarized sunglasses offer durability, optical precision and full-spectrum glare elimination-all without distortion. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. Black gloss frames come with polarized gray lenses for neutral, true color perception in bright light. Tortoise frames come with polarized bronze lenses for enhanced contrast in bright light. VonZipper Snark sunglasses feature protective lens coatings to resist water, smudging, scratching and impact. Stainless-steel hinges boost durability. 6-base-curve lenses; (the higher the number the more curved the lens-VonZipper features sunglasses with 6, 8 and 9 base curvature).
short_description: Made in Italy, the VonZipper Snark polarized sunglasses offer durability, optical precision and full-spectrum glare elimination-all without distortion.
